news.body: IALR 1.6pre18 supports the latest version of DL2. Please report bugs on the Discord ialr-dl2-bug-reporting channel, thanks and happy gaming
I Am Legion will be coming to The Beast when it is released so stay tuned.
Development on IALR will continue after the tools have been finished. The tools are currently at 95% completion and alpha releases will hoping go out in November
May be a crash during the daytime after the 1.21.0 update, IALR 1.6pre18 hopefully fixes that
